Text: What is a data policy?

Answers.Text: Enables admins to set mandatory and read only states for fields and can enforce data consistency across applications. You can set import data as read only, e.g., user info
It's the control record of the table and determines whether the table will be audited, default sorting, attributes of table and how it will behave when it is a reference field
It's a series of tables that contain all the assets and business services controlled by your company as well as their configuration

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is:

It's a script that applies to a form to dynamically change form information or the form itself

Text: Where would you go to start an import set?
wpProQuiz_correct: To start an import set in ServiceNow, you'd navigate to System Import Sets > Load Data. Load Data is the specific function used to initiate the import process.

Text: What gets skipped during a major upgrade?

Answers.Text: Read only data of a form that is not editable
All system features, applications, functions, and data
Any record that has been altered from the base state. The upgrade app looks at the customer update table (e.g,, sys_update_xml)

They run on the cloud side
